entries.Mon: Weak. He's weak. You're strong. Crush him.$5
entries.Tue: No. Kill him. Crush his bones. Tear at his flesh.$5
entries.Wed: You will kill. You will kill, or you will die!$5
entries.Thu: Yes. Your reward is waiting for you, mortal. Further down.$1
entries.Sat: So close. Your prize is waiting.$1
